attributes.action: Don't make the Covid-19 vaccine mandatory.
attributes.additional_details: I want to make sure that i have the freedom to travel or go to the supermarket/shops even if i havent taken the Coranavirus Vaccine.
attributes.background: I want to make sure that if or when the Vaccine for the Coranavirus comes out in the UK, for it not to be mandatory and for everyone to have the choice whether or not if they want to take it.

rejection.details:
It is already against the law for people to be required to undergo medical treatment, including vaccinations. The Coronavirus Act 2020 has not changed this.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Prevent any restrictions on those who refuse a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323442

Do not implement Covid-19 Freedom Passes: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561818
